text: maryaminṟe makan īsā paṟaññu: ñaṅṅaḷuṭe rakṣitāvāya allāhuvē, ñaṅṅaḷkk nī ākāśatt ninn oru bhakṣaṇattaḷika iṟakkittarēṇamē. ñaṅṅaḷkk‌, ñaṅṅaḷile ādyattiluḷḷavannuṁ, avasānattiluḷḷavannuṁ oru perunnāḷuṁ, ninṟe pakkal ninnuḷḷa oru dr̥ṣṭāntavumāyirikkaṇaṁ at‌. ñaṅṅaḷkk nī upajīvanaṁ nalkukayuṁ ceyyēṇamē. nī upajīvanaṁ nalkunnavaril ēṟṟavuṁ uttamanāṇallēā
